Title: Relates to adjustment of electric residential fixed charges
Summary: Directs the department of public service to adjust each utility corporation's residential fixed charge upon such corporation's filing with the department of an amendment of rate schedules, to recover only the fixed costs and operation and maintenance expenses directly related to metering, billing, service connections and the provision of customer service.
LawCode: Add ยง42-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to adjustment of electric residential fixed charges
